description: Tool used to change the phase centre of a measurement set

parameters.info: Name of MS file to change the phase centre
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: New RA to change to. The format of RA can either be 00h00m00.0s or 00:00:00.0
parameters.name: new-ra

parameters.info: New DEC to change to. The format of DEC can either be 00h00m00.0s or 00:00:00.0
parameters.name: new-dec

parameters.info: Rephase to the direction orthogonal to the best-fit plane to the antennas
parameters.name: minw

parameters.info: Rephase to the local array zenith
parameters.name: zenith

parameters.info: Prepare the measurement set for w-snapshot imaging with WSClean
parameters.name: shiftback
